property.name: Rules
property.value: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)

property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a green spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Boundless Growth. {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Boundless Growth: Add to your mana pool {1} for each charge counter on Shrine of Boundless Growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage. {3},{T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: Shrine of Burning Rage deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a black spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power. {4},{T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Limitless Power: Target player discards a card for each charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a white spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions. {3},{T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Loyal Legions: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield for each charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a blue spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Piercing Vision. {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Piercing Vision: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of charge counters on Shrine of Piercing Vision. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {6},{T}: Two target players exchange life totals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {PU}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite.({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Surge Node enters the battlefield with six charge counters on it. {1},{T}, Remove a charge counter from Surge Node: Put a charge counter on target artifact.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {PU}: Trespassing Souleater is unblockable this turn.({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1},{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.
